Description: Rest on flight into Egypt: Holy Family seated under a tree, Virgin breastfeeding Child Christ who lies in her arms, Joseph reading next to them; two figures on a boat in a lake in the left middle distance; a landscape in the left background. 1806 Pen lithograph
Curator's comments: See Felix Man, in 'Print' edited by C. Zigrosser 1962, p.125, cat. 125. The print has been dated by Man, based on circumstance and technical progress.
